languages.text: Can't be dodged. Can't be survived. Requires {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g} shell to fire!

traits.locale_text: Can't be dodged. Can't be survived. Requires {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g} shell to fire!

languages.text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!
languages.translation_comment: any living target - supposed to mean "any target but attachment point". Maybe we should re-word it?
languages.original_text: Этот снаряд мгновенно уничтожают любую живую цель. От него нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}. После выстрела этим снарядом танк завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Чтобы выстрелить, нужно привести танк в {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}боеготовность{/g}, загрузив в него снаряд!

traits.locale_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be dodged. After shooting this shell, the tank ends its turn. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

languages.text: Этот снаряд мгновенно уничтожают любую живую цель. От него нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}. После выстрела этим снарядом танк завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Чтобы выстрелить, нужно привести танк в {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}боеготовность{/g}, загрузив в него снаряд!
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

languages.text: Bu top mermisi canlı bir hedefi anında öldürür. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Kaçınmak{/g} mümkün değildir. Tank, top mermisini attıktan sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırır. Tankın bu top mermisiyle {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}doldurulmuş{/g} olması gerekir!
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

traits.locale_text: Bu top mermisi canlı bir hedefi anında öldürür. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Kaçınmak{/g} mümkün değildir. Tank, top mermisini attıktan sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırır. Tankın bu top mermisiyle {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}doldurulmuş{/g} olması gerekir!

languages.text: Este obús mata instantáneamente a cualquier objetivo vivo. No se puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}. Tras disparar el obús, el tanque finaliza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. ¡El tanque debe tener {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}cargado{/g} el obús!
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

traits.locale_text: Este obús mata instantáneamente a cualquier objetivo vivo. No se puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}. Tras disparar el obús, el tanque finaliza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. ¡El tanque debe tener {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}cargado{/g} el obús!

languages.text: 这种炮弹可以一击杀死任何有生命的目标，此次攻击无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。坦克发射炮弹之后，会立刻结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。 炮弹必须处于{g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}装填就绪{/g}状态才能发射！
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

traits.locale_text: 这种炮弹可以一击杀死任何有生命的目标，此次攻击无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。坦克发射炮弹之后，会立刻结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。 炮弹必须处于{g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}装填就绪{/g}状态才能发射！

languages.text: Cet obus tue instantanément les cibles vivantes et ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivé{/g}. Après le tir de l'obus, le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du char prend fin. Cet obus doit être {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}chargé{/g} dans le char !
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

traits.locale_text: Cet obus tue instantanément les cibles vivantes et ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivé{/g}. Après le tir de l'obus, le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du char prend fin. Cet obus doit être {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}chargé{/g} dans le char !

languages.text: このシェルは、あらゆる生きたターゲットを即死させる。{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}不能。そのシェルを撃った後、タンクはその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了する。 タンクにはこのシェルが{g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}装填{/g}されていなければならない！
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

traits.locale_text: このシェルは、あらゆる生きたターゲットを即死させる。{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}不能。そのシェルを撃った後、タンクはその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了する。 タンクにはこのシェルが{g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}装填{/g}されていなければならない！

languages.text: Diese Granate tötet jedes lebende Ziel auf der Stelle. Ihr kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} werden. Nach dem Abfeuern der Granate beendet der Panzer seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Der Panzer muss diese Granate {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}geladen{/g} haben!
languages.original_text: This shell instantly kills any living target. Cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. After shooting the shell, the tank ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The tank must have this shell {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}loaded{/g}!

Nach dem Abfeuern der Granate beendet der Panzer seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Der Panzer muss diese Granate {g|f:e333333dfe6040b7bf9acfab8b450264}geladen{/g} haben!
